page.title: 15PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: People play lots of games outside like hopscotch.Hopscotch is a game that you can play two ways.You throw a stone.When you go up you leave it but when you come back down again you pick it up.You can play rounders,tennis,tig round the school and all sorts of other games.P.E.means games or gymnastics.Skipping makes you fit and it's a game too.We say Mrs.D Mrs.I Mrs.FFI Mrs.C Mrs.U Mrs.LTY.That spells the word difficulty. Other rhymes are said when you are skipping.Boys can play football.Edenham have played lots of schools.They play six a side football. They played in a tournament at Baston Fete and did very well.They lost to Baston 2-0,beat Thurlby B 2-0 and beat Thurlby C 3-0.They managed to get into the semi-finals.It was a hard fought match.They just lost 2-1.
